title: Donating on omaze (Supported through Riot)

embed.description: We&rsquo;re flying you and a friend to Barcelona for the League of Legends All-Stars Event to play games on the stage and hang out with your favorite pro players.&nbsp;Once in Spain, we're decking you out in League swag while you're snapping unique photo ops and exploring Barcelona!

body: Could Riot as a Partner/Sponsor suggest to omaze, that they make donations through PaySafe-Cards available? Cause otherwise I won´t be able to donate and many others won´t donate either because they simply don´t have Paypal and/or don´t want to donate through their master card/etc. .

replies.body:
Partners rarely have control over the main company's site or their operations. For this reason, I recommend [contacting Omaze directly](http://weloveyou@omaze.com) about this suggestion.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I know that Partners don´t have any control over them, but I thought that if someone from Riot suggest it to them, that it will be more likely that they will add this payment method as if some random suggest it to them. 

Also if I use your link, I get a warning about a possible phising site. I will contact them on another way.
